I001: Product Information Inquiry: Inquiring about overall product details including usage methods, components, quantity, options, price, design, materials, expiration date, country of origin, installation methods, etc.
I002: Product Number Confirmation: Inquiring about Coupang product numbers or how to confirm them
I003: After-Sales Service Information: Inquiring about overall AS-related matters including availability, application methods, service center information, costs, and required time
I004: Product Out of Stock: Inquiring about product being out of stock before or after ordering
I005: Restock: Inquiring about restocking schedule for sold-out products or requesting restock notifications
I006: Product Price Complaint/Error: Requesting complaints or corrections regarding product price changes, comparisons with competitors, price errors, etc.
I007: Product Different from Expectations: Complaints about received products differing from expectations in performance, composition, quantity, color, size, design, material, taste, freshness, etc.
I008: Expiration/Best Before Date Dissatisfaction: Complaints about received products having imminent expiration dates, old manufacturing dates, or discrepancies between product information and actual labeling
I009: AS Unavailable: Inquiring after being informed AS is unavailable from seller or unable to connect with AS center
I010: Genuine/Counterfeit: Inquiring to confirm if product is genuine or requesting refund due to suspected counterfeit
I011: Different from Description/Order: Inquiring about received products differing from product page descriptions, images, or ordered items/options
I012: Received Used Product: Inquiring after ordering new product but receiving one with signs of use
I013: Country of Origin/Manufacturing Label Issues: Inquiring about missing or incorrect country of origin/manufacturing labels on product or product page
I014: Foreign Substances: Complaints about foreign substances found in product or packaging, or other customers' items or logistics materials delivered together
I015: Product Deterioration: Complaints about received products being spoiled or deteriorated
I016: Personal Injury/Safety Accident: Complaints about side effects after product use, or safety accidents like bodily injury, explosions, fires caused by products
I017: Expiration/Manufacturing Date Unverifiable: Inquiring when dates cannot be confirmed due to damaged or missing product labels
I018: Expired Product: Complaints about received products already past expiration date
I019: Frozen/Melted: Complaints about refrigerated products arriving frozen or frozen products arriving melted
I020: Functional Defect: Inquiring about abnormal heat generation or partial functions not working properly during product use
I021: Installation Defect: Inquiring about difficulty in self-installation due to defective parts or problems from incorrect installation by technicians
I022: Color/Size/Surface Defects: Complaints about defects in color, size, or surface (stains, contamination, finish) of received products
I023: Product Damage: Complaints about delivered products arriving with damaged exterior or packaging
I024: Property Damage: Inquiring about customer's other property or facilities being damaged or contaminated due to product issues
I025: Recall: Confirming whether specific products are subject to recall or inquiring about follow-up measures after recall notice
I026: Packaging Damage: Inquiring about damaged delivery boxes or vinyl packaging
I027: Inadequate/Excessive Packaging: Complaints about inadequate packaging (missing ice packs, insufficient cushioning) or excessive packaging relative to product
I028: Packaging Material Information: Inquiring about materials used in delivery packaging or disposal methods
I029: New Packaging Method: Inquiring after receiving products in new packaging methods (eco-bags, new fresh bags, etc.)
I030: Gift Wrapping: Inquiring about availability or methods for gift wrapping products
I031: Packaging Method: Inquiring about how products are packaged for delivery (boxes, vinyl, etc.)
I032: Fresh Bag Collection Location: Requesting changes to fresh bag collection address or location (doorstep, security office, etc.)
I033: Fresh Bag Collection Schedule: Requesting changes to collection dates or inquiring about non-collection on requested dates
I034: Fresh Bag Collected with Products Inside: Cases where delivery person collected fresh bag with products still inside
I035: Fresh Bag Selection Method: Inquiring about how to select fresh bag or regular box delivery for Rocket Fresh orders
I036: Fresh Bag Receipt Complaint: Inquiring after receiving fresh bag despite selecting regular box delivery
I037: Regular Box Receipt Complaint: Inquiring after receiving regular box despite selecting fresh bag delivery
I038: Fresh Bag Hygiene: Complaints about hygiene and cleanliness of collected fresh bags
I039: Fresh Bag Damage: Inquiring about damaged or deteriorated fresh bags received or in possession
I040: Fresh Bag Found: Inquiring after finding previously lost fresh bag
I041: Fresh Bag Purchase: Inquiring whether fresh bags can be purchased separately
I042: Fresh Bag Missing: Inquiring when system shows possession but bag is not available or lost
I043: Fresh Bag Ice Pack Disposal: Inquiring about disposal methods for ice packs delivered with fresh bags
I044: Arrival Schedule: Inquiring about or complaining about overall delivery schedules including customs clearance status, expected arrival dates/times, schedule change reasons
I045: Delivery Status Mismatch: Requesting correction when actual status differs from system (e.g., received but shows 'in delivery')
I046: Direct Product Pickup: Inquiring about picking up products directly from logistics camps or courier branch offices
I047: Delivery Minimum Amount: Inquiring about minimum order amounts for Rocket Delivery or Rocket Fresh services
I048: Delivery Coverage Area: Inquiring about Rocket Delivery availability in specific areas or requesting service area expansion
I049: Delivery Type Information: Inquiring about various Coupang delivery types like Same-Day Guarantee, Dawn Delivery
I050: Old Appliance Collection: Inquiring whether old appliances are collected when new ones are installed
I051: Installation Requests: Requesting delivery or changes to installation-related requests
I052: Delivery Costs: Inquiring about or complaining about delivery-related costs including COD, combined shipping
I053: Installation Costs: Inquiring about installation fees or complaining about overcharging
I054: Delivery Address: Requesting changes to delivery address or inquiring after entering incorrect address
I055: Delivery Address Book: Inquiring about managing (changing, deleting) addresses registered in My Coupang address book
I056: Recipient Information: Requesting changes to recipient name or contact information entered during ordering
I057: Delivery Requests/Memos: Requesting changes to delivery location (doorstep, security office) or entry passwords
I058: Delivery Suspension Reason: Inquiring about reasons for delivery suspension of ordered products
I059: Delivery Completion Photo: Inquiring when delivery completion photos are not received or unclear about product location
I060: Unordered Item Contact: Inquiring after receiving delivery notifications (text, call) for unordered products
I061: Delivery Notification Time: Inquiring about setting delivery notification times or complaining about notification times
I062: Delivery Request Non-compliance: Complaining when products delivered to locations other than requested (doorstep, unmanned lockers)
I063: Quantity/Component Missing: Inquiring about insufficient quantities or missing basic components or gifts
I064: Gift Wrapping Missing: Inquiring when products delivered without gift wrapping despite request
I065: Delivery Complete but Not Received: Inquiring when system shows 'delivered' but products not actually received or misdelivered
I066: Empty Box/Package Received: Cases where delivered boxes or packages are opened but contain no products
I067: Found Missing Product: Cases where previously unreceived products are found or re-delivered by driver
I068: Received Other Customer's Product: Inquiring after receiving unordered products belonging to others
I069: Over-delivery: Inquiring when unordered products delivered together or more quantity delivered than ordered
I070: Damage/Loss During Delivery Contact: Requesting confirmation after being contacted about product damage or loss during delivery
I071: Product Received After Cancellation: Requesting collection when products delivered despite order cancellation or return request
I072: Installation Impossible: Requesting order cancellation when installation technician visits but cannot install due to site conditions
I073: Customs Code Usage: Inquiring about issuance, confirmation, and usage of personal customs clearance codes
I074: Customs Code Input Complaint: Complaining about being required to enter personal customs clearance codes for overseas direct purchases
I075: Customs Code Deletion: Requesting deletion of personal customs clearance codes registered in Coupang account
I076: Customs Code Modification: Inquiring about modification methods or customs issues from incorrect entry
I077: Customs Office Contact: Inquiring about customs office contact information for customs and duty issues
I078: Customs Duties: Inquiring about duty standards or occurrence for overseas direct purchases
I079: Customs Duty Refund: Inquiring about possibility and procedures for refunding paid duties when canceling/returning overseas products
I080: Customs Standards: Inquiring when customs issues arise from exceeding quantity/weight limits or radio wave law violations
I081: Prohibited Import Items: Inquiring about prohibited items for overseas purchases or after receiving non-clearance notices
I082: Customs Procedures: Inquiring about overall customs procedures for overseas direct purchase products
I083: Courier/Driver Information: Inquiring about courier company or driver contact information, or lost contact with driver
I084: Driver Throwing Packages: Complaining about delivery drivers throwing products during delivery
I085: Driver Property/Facility Damage: Complaining about customer property or public facilities damaged by delivery driver
I086: Driver Attitude Complaint: Complaining about driver behavior, expressions, bell/knock methods, non-compliance with quarantine guidelines
I087: Driver Speech Complaint: Complaining about driver's rude speech or verbal abuse/profanity
I088: Driver Contact Complaint: Feeling uncomfortable or complaining about delivery-related contact itself
I089: Driver Blocking Entry: Inquiring about inconvenience from doorway blocked by delivered products
I090: Delivery Vehicle Complaint: Complaining about dangerous driving, improper parking, traffic accidents of delivery vehicles
I091: Exchange Costs: Inquiring about amounts or standards for costs incurred during product exchanges
I092: Exchange Method: Inquiring about methods and procedures for requesting or withdrawing product exchanges
I093: Seller Exchange Refusal: Inquiring about exchange possibility or alternatives when seller refuses exchange
I094: Seller Exchange Agreement: Requesting exchange processing through Coupang after agreeing with seller
I095: Exchange Request Confirmation: Requesting confirmation of proper receipt of exchange or withdrawal request
I096: Forced Cancellation: Inquiring about reasons for order cancellation without request or complaining about unilateral cancellation
I097: Cancellation/Return Costs: Inquiring about amounts, standards, combined packaging cost handling for order cancellation or returns
I098: Cancellation/Return Method: Inquiring about methods and procedures for order cancellation or return requests/withdrawals
I099: Cancellation/Return Request Confirmation: Inquiring whether cancellation/return or withdrawal properly received, or if request reason can be changed
I100: Seller Cancellation/Return Refusal: Inquiring about processing possibility or alternatives when seller refuses cancellation or return
I101: Seller Cancellation/Return Agreement: Requesting processing through Coupang after agreeing with seller on cancellation or return
I102: Re-shipment: Inquiring about re-shipment request or progress due to delivery delays
I103: Corrected Delivery Confirmation: Confirming processing results or requesting withdrawal of corrected delivery for misdelivery
I104: Collection Storage/Packaging Method: Inquiring about pre-collection storage locations or repackaging methods for exchange/return products, or difficulty repackaging
I105: Combined Packaging Possibility: Inquiring whether multiple exchange/return products can be packaged and collected in one box
I106: Collection Location Loss Concern: Inquiring due to concern about loss if products placed at designated collection locations like doorsteps
I107: Self-disposal Method: Inquiring about meaning or methods after being instructed to dispose of products without collection
I108: Collection Address: Confirming or requesting changes to address for exchange/return product collection
I109: Collection Requests: Delivering or inquiring about changes to collection location (doorstep, security office) or method requests
I110: Collection Contact: Confirming or requesting changes to contact information for collection-related notifications
I111: Return Information: Inquiring about tracking numbers for collected exchange/return products, requesting tracking number registration after self-shipping, or return addresses
I112: Collection Schedule: Inquiring about overall collection schedules including expected dates/times, delays, and status
I113: Collection Contact Availability: Inquiring whether delivery driver contacts in advance for product collection
I114: Collection Contact Complaint: Complaining about collection-related contact times or frequency
I115: Collection Omission: Inquiring when collection not properly done, such as missing invoices or system showing 'collection complete' without actual collection
I116: Wrong Product Collected: Cases where delivery driver mistakenly collects products other than those requested for exchange/return
I117: Collection Product Loss: Inquiring about exchange/return products lost from designated collection locations
I118: Found Collection Product: Inquiring after finding previously lost products subject to collection
I119: Collection Stop Request: Requesting collection stop when products already self-disposed, exchange/return withdrawn, or collection no longer needed
I120: Collection Refusal Confirmation: Inquiring about reasons and solutions when courier refuses collection due to size limits

I122: Emergency Collection Request: Requesting quick collection due to concerns about secondary damage from damaged or deteriorated products

I127: Refund Schedule: Inquiring about overall refund progress including processing status, expected dates, delay reasons, hold status

I302: Review Writing: Inquiring about writing methods and image attachment for product reviews on purchased products
I303: Review Error: Inquiring about errors when unable to write reviews or written reviews not displaying
I304: Review Modification: Inquiring about methods to modify already written review content or requesting modifications
I305: Review Deletion/Recovery: Requesting deletion of written reviews or inquiring about recovery possibility for deleted reviews
I306: Review Report: Requesting reports for inappropriate content like profanity or personal information exposure in others' reviews
I307: Review Ranking: Inquiring about excellent review selection criteria or personal review rankings
I308: Review Blind: Inquiring about reasons for personal reviews being made private (blind) or removal possibility
I309: Review Display Criteria: Inquiring about review display order (best order, etc.) or reasons for non-display on pages
I310: Language Settings: Inquiring about methods to change display language in Coupang app or website
I311: Experience Group Invitation: Inquiring about selection criteria or invitation methods for 'Coupang Experience Group' for free product experience and review writing
I312: Experience Group Products: Inquiring about available product types or change possibility after selection as Coupang Experience Group
I313: Experience Group Usage Method: Inquiring about product application and usage procedures after selection as Coupang Experience Group
I314: Experience Group Coupon: Inquiring about coupon issuance, application methods, or error resolution required for Experience Group product purchases
I315: Experience Group Review: Inquiring about review writing criteria or methods for products received as Experience Group
I316: Experience Group Error: Inquiring about system errors during Experience Group product application and purchase process
I317: Experience Group Product Out of Stock: Cases where Experience Group application products are out of stock and unavailable
I318: Coupang Partners: Inquiring about 'Coupang Partners' program for promoting Coupang products and earning revenue through personal blogs or SNS
I319: App/Site Error: Inquiring about system errors like specific page access failures or function malfunctions during Coupang app or website usage
I320: Login Method: Inquiring about methods to login to Coupang account on app or website
I321: Account Recovery: Inquiring about methods to recover lost ID or password
I322: Login Error: Inquiring when 'error' message displayed and unable to login during login attempts
I323: Login Failed: Inquiring about inability to login despite entering correct ID and password
I324: Share Rewards: Inquiring about 'Share Rewards' program usage methods and cash accumulation through product link sharing
I325: App/Site Usability Complaint: Suggesting complaints or improvements about Coupang app or website design, functions, and usability
I326: Compliment Submission: Conveying satisfaction and praise for Coupang services, consultants, delivery drivers, products, etc.
I327: Coupang Asset Abandonment: Requesting handling of Coupang-owned assets like pallets used for delivery abandoned in public places
I328: Customer Center Operating Hours: Inquiring about Coupang customer center consultation available hours
I329: Customer Center Contact: Inquiring about Coupang customer center contact information like phone numbers
I330: Customer Center Inquiry Method: Inquiring about methods to contact Coupang customer center like phone or chat, or seller contact methods
I331: Consultation History: Inquiring about processing results of previous inquiries or reasons for receiving customer center calls like missed calls
I332: Consultation Information Access: Requesting access to past consultation recordings or chat history
I333: Consultation History Deletion: Requesting deletion of past consultation history or attached files during consultation
I334: Consultation Interruption: Ending calls without specific business after consultation connection or inquiring after mistaken connection to other company's customer center
I335: Customer Inappropriate Behavior: Cases of inappropriate behavior toward consultants like profanity, verbal abuse, or sexual remarks
I336: Consultant Connection: Requesting connection with specific consultants or senior managers
I337: Face-to-face Consultation Request: Inquiring about headquarters location wanting face-to-face consultation through customer center visits
I338: Consultant Response Complaint: Complaining about consultant's response attitude or inadequate business handling
I339: Consultation Delay Complaint: Complaining about delays in consultant's answers or promised contacts
I340: Product Inquiry Writing/Management: Inquiring about writing, modifying, deleting, and checking answers for 'Product Inquiry' function in product pages
I341: External Organization/Media Contact: External organizations like consumer protection agencies or media requesting connection with Coupang representatives or business cooperation
I342: Seller Contact: Coupang marketplace sellers inquiring about sales activities like settlement or advertising
I343: Courier Contact: Other courier company drivers contacting customer center for delivery-related information (safe numbers, etc.)
I344: Coupang Employee Contact: Coupang employees inquiring about internal policies like welfare and benefits
I345: Foreign Customer Contact: Foreign customers requesting consultation or inquiring in foreign languages
I346: Disabled Customer Contact: Requesting separate support due to difficulties using general services because of disabilities
I347: Evidence Submission Method: Inquiring about methods to send files like photos or videos to customer center to prove problem situations like product defects
I348: Evidence Requirement: Inquiring whether evidence submission like photos is mandatory for specific business processing like exchanges/returns
I349: Product Provider Information: Inquiring about information on sales entity like seller name and contact for purchased products
I350: Seller Unreachable: Requesting mediation when no response or unable to contact product seller after inquiry
I351: Seller Response Complaint: Complaining about seller's unfriendly attitude, profanity, mentioning legal action, and other response methods
I352: Form Defect/Damage: Complaining about received products arriving with damaged exteriors, finishing defects, contamination, or other abnormal forms
I353: Dawn Delivery Availability: Inquiring whether products to be ordered or already ordered are eligible for dawn delivery
I354: Refund Method: Inquiring about specific refund processing methods according to payment methods and timing, like canceling during installment payments after credit card payment
I355: Coupay Money Payment: Inquiring about procedures or methods for payment using Coupay Money
I356: No Intent: Cases where customers do not express specific intent or requests in inquiries
